website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for the number of entries it contains and for the addition of the encyclopedia and complete thesaurus.
pros: With over 240,000 word entries, the Seiko is one of the most complete electronic dictionaries on the market
Includes a phonetic spell-checker and large word-base thesaurus, along with a 25,000-entry Britannica encyclopedia, making the Seiko an overall complete reference tool
Unit is simple to use, with one-touch toggling between modes
cons: The screen is not lit, and may be difficult to view in low lighting

customer_reviews.title: Okay, But Physical Design Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be okay for its intended purpose and basic function, based on just one or two uses. However, the lower 3-star rating has to do with the unit's construction, assembly, etc. If you are not careful and tilt the screen too far back for the best view, the thing will just flip all the way over. In other words the top screen part is heavier than the bottom keypad so it is not balanced well. They need to either provide a better, more visible screen so it doesn't have to be adjusted so far past the 90 degree vertical or they need to add weight to the bottom keypad.
customer_reviews.author: SRT

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had a pretty good electronic dictionary a few years back but it went belly up. If I could have I would have purchased the same. This one is OK but there's something about the utility of the screen. I seem to use it only with some difficulty. The light needs to be 'just' right to read the display. If this dictionary/encyclopedia could be lighted it would be much, much better.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: It serves it's purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replace a Sharp Electronic Dictionary he'd had for 10 years. Was starting to lose the print, showing lines. The Seiko doesn't have as much as his Sharp did but he uses it several times daily. It serves it's purpose and just hope it lasts the 10 years his Sharp did.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, but avoid this product!
customer_reviews.text: This Seiko mod. ER8100 dictionary was fine for about 5 or 6 months. The cost was over $100. That is not a sign of a quality product. The arrow button used to scan downward is sticking and not functioning properly. It sticks and is difficult to use. There is no contact when pushing the button. This button should have been made stronger since it used a lot. In this price range I expected a better quality product. I can not recommend this Seiko product. I would not buy this unit again. You should seriously consider a different dictionary since 6 months is too short a time for failure.
customer_reviews.author: B Truckman

customer_reviews.title: What?
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it saves me time in looking up words. I am disappointed in the Britannica. There is no crossover with the dictionary to expound on the subject. I wish it were LED so I could read it in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: LIMITED LIFE EXPECTANCY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Seiko ER8100 Britannica & Oxford Reference Library device 14 months ago and it just went belly up and needs repair---if that's even possible. No manufacturer return or repair information was provided with a receipt and the Information Booklet failed to provide this information, except an international phone number which was a dead end. For such a quality price/product - this failed result is unsupportable by a well-known corporation. I did re-order the same model because it provided excellent information. Planned obsolescence is bad business!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great for students!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. Just wish the screen had another line or two of text.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic resource, the best electric dictionary I've used. Almost never lacks word being searched.
customer_reviews.author: raymond biasotti

customer_reviews.title: Some words just are not defined.
customer_reviews.text: Some words for which I sought definitions just relayed if the word were a noun or adjective or listed related words. Other times I was told what I needed to know. So - not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Phil J

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this device for parents and they are very happy with it so far! It's cute, small and very well designed. I think it's definitely one of the best choices among similar items.
customer_reviews.author: O.K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! So worth the purchase. Dictionary. Thesaurus.quotes from authors. Games.
customer_reviews.author: Neny

customer_reviews.title: Lots of words and derivations
customer_reviews.text: It was good for what I needed to use it for. It is advanced but simple at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: It is not the size they say
customer_reviews.text: It is an inch and a half smaller then what they said it is. Bought it for my 94 year old father in law. He wanted it bigger. They should not put a size down if it is not going to be that size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He looks up obscure words often.
customer_reviews.author: Millie hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great English Language Resource
customer_reviews.text: An invaluable tool for teachers and students alike.....portable and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This was returned. Too difficult to use for my 85 yr old father.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Great Puzzle Solver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Seiko ER8100 when a replacement for my worn out Sharp dictionary/thesaurus was not available. I used my Sharp regularly for several years when stumped on cryptic crossword clues. Other less expensive products did not have the large screen and extensive capabilities of the Seiko. It has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne B.

customer_reviews.title: KNOW SOMEONE WHO’S IN COLLEGE? They need this in their book bag at all times!
customer_reviews.text: A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY FRESHMAN IN COLLEGE! It’s the dictionary, thesaurus, encyclopedia, famous people’s quotes/sayings & calculator all it one! PERFECT “your off to college gift”
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it included more American idioms and definitions. It is not particularly convenient to operate.
customer_reviews.author: vpa

customer_reviews.title: Sound reference tool!
customer_reviews.text: The range of functions is outstanding. My only complaint is that the screen is too dark. Otherwise, I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. A little difícil to use. Otherwise it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Perez

customer_reviews.title: The dictionary gives me great definitions and I also like playing hangman
customer_reviews.text: The dictionary gives me great definitions and I also like playing hangman. The only thing I would like to have gotten was this with a backlight. Does it have a carrying case?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great help while i am writing
customer_reviews.text: Use it seven days a week, great help while i am writing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Popovich

customer_reviews.title: All other features are great.
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen is too dark. LCD screen adjustment does very little to exhibit contrast. Very disappointing . All other features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tringali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This a very handy and informative help when reading advanced Wikipedia articles
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ryan

product_meta.title: Seiko ER8100 Britannica and Oxford Reference Library
product_meta.description:
This electronic version of the Britannica Concise Encyclopedia is the ultimate pocket sized reference library, perfect for home, school or office. Produced by Seiko Instruments Inc. incorporating data licensed from Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc. and Oxford University Press.

With more than 25,000 articles prepared by the editors of Encyclopaedia Britannica, it covers nearly every field of human knowledge: history, geography, world affairs, the sciences, religion, sports, entertainment, technology and the arts. It also contains the full contents of the Concise Oxford Dictionary, Thesaurus and Quotations.

Product Features:
feature_bullets: Britannica Concise Encyclopedia – Contains more than 25,000 entries.
Concise Oxford English Dictionary (New Edition) – Contains over 240,000 words, phrases and definitions, including 1,700 new words.
Concise Oxford Thesaurus – Contains over 4 million synonym links and oxford dictionary of english idioms-this major new edition contains entries for 6,000 idioms
Oxford Concise Dictionary of Quotations – Over 9,000 quotations from 2,500 authors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars189 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
